item.title: Photography Club photo feature at the Pflugerville Public Library
item.description:
Event dates: September 26, 2014 - October 10, 2014
Location:
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Come to the Pflugerville Public Library, 1008 W Pfluger Street, from September 26 – November 22 to view photographs from Pflugerville’s Photography Club on display. The group, as part of the Pflugerville Council of the Arts, also has a Flickr group where local photographers are encouraged to share photos from the Pflugerville area. The flickr group is where photographers can post photos on various topics and themes that the club discusses. This new club compliments several photography workshops the library has held for adults in the summer reading program. Come visit the library and see which photo is your favorite.

item.title: National Night Out
item.description:
Event date: October 7, 2014
Location:
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
On Tuesday, October 7, 2014 neighborhoods throughout the City of Pflugerville are invited to join forces with thousands of communities nationwide for the 30th Annual National Night Out Crime and Drug Prevention Event. National Night Out is supported by the National Association of Town Watch and in part by the Bureau of Justice Assistance, Office of Justice Programs and the U.S. Department of Justice.

item.title: PAWS for Networking - "How to Cope With Pet Loss Grief"
item.description:
Event date: October 9, 2014
Location:
13995 N. Highway 183
Austin, TX 78717
Description:
Networking and Informational speakers for those of us who believe our pets are part of our family. Appetizers, private room, networking, door prizes, cash bar and speakers. Our speaker for October is Psychotherapist and and Owner/Instructor of Austin DOGA, Nicole Vykoukal. Nicole will be speaking on a much requested topic that affects all pet owners and rescue people at some point - "How to Cope With Pet Loss Grief".

10% of all ticket sales, 5% of all drink sales and 20% of all Pokey t-shirt and tote bag sales will be donated back to Pflugerville Pets Alive. Additional donation boxes will be located throughout the event, for anyone wanting to help Pflugerville Pets Alive with their mission of helping save more homeless dogs and cats from the Pflugerville city shelter, get them any needed medical attention and help them find loving foster homes until they find their new forever homes.

There will be a buffet of flatbread pizzas (both vegetarian and BBQ chicken options), sala

item.title: Adult Craft Night - Jewelry Stand
item.description:
Event date: October 9, 2014
Location:
1008 W. Pfluger St.
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Build a jewelry stand using simple dishes. Materials provided while supplies last. Anyone 18 and up welcome.

item.title: PfCONA Meeting
item.description:
Event date: October 13, 2014
Location:
1611 Pfennig Land (south of Walmart)
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Meet Pflugerville residents involved in HOA boards or neighborhood groups to discuss issues like traffic, growth, crime, and building a better community.

item.description:

Location:
1008 W. Pfluger St.
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Bring your iPad, Kindle, or other device to the Library and learn how to download ebooks, music, and more! Sign up for an appointment by calling or visiting the Library.

item.title: Tech Club - LED Bracelets
item.description:
Event date: October 16, 2014
Location:
1008 W. Pfluger St.
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
From October through December, we'll be partnering with TechShop of Round Rock for a monthly Tech Club program. We'll meet the third Thursday of each month from 6:00-7:30 pm. This month, we'll make felt bracelets that light up using LED lights.

This program is for teens and adults. Materials are provided. Space is limited - sign up by calling or visiting the library.

item.title: Yappy Hour
item.description:
Event date: October 17, 2014
Location:
2400 Patterson Industrial Dr
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Join Pflugerville Pets Alive the third Friday of every month for Yappy Hour at the brewery! Bring your furry friends and your thirst. $1 from every beer goes to Pflugerville Pets Alive!

item.title: Yappy Hour Benefiting Pflugerville Pets Alive!
item.description:
Event date: October 17, 2014
Location:
2400 Patterson Industrial Dr.
Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
Bring your favorite furry friend and grab a glass of locally made craft beer at Rogness Brewing Company Friday, 9/19, 4-10 PM. $1 from every glass of beer sold will benefit the community's pets through Pflugerville Pets Alive!

We appreciate you maintaining the relaxed atmosphere of this event by keeping your well-behaved dog on a non-retractable leash.

Pflugerville, TX 78660
Description:
